question: You hired a car from a company, while. While you were driving you had a small accident.Write a letter to the company to explain it.In your letter:when and where you hired itdescribe how the accident happenedwhat kind of action did you take after the accident
text: I am writing to inform you that, I had taken the 4 wheeler from our company on yesterday for my official work. Because unfortunately, I met with a small accident today morning.

Firstly, as on, yesterday I have taken a vehicle from our company transport department which is going to purchase a few materials for our new project. Because due to pandemic were projected task was delayed. So it needs to be complete within a short duration of time.

Although, while I was driving a car in the morning in Janaki Raman Street, which is civil workers occupied the whole area due to that, heavy traffic on that place. However, someone from the backside knocked on our car. Even though, the whole part of storage place which is present behind the car was heavily crushed.

Hence, I had words with the person about to take  responsibility to do provide money to get our vehicle in good condition, who has done the mistake. And, he also accept our justice about which was happened in the morning.
My sincere apology to happened a small accident.
